entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
